heading: Today
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun. Warm. Some clouds in NY and Quebec late.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Some clouds, a few spotty showers north. Partly cloudy south.

heading: Friday
text: Clouds giving way to increasing sun.
temperature: Low to mid 60s north, upper 60s to mid 70s south

heading: Saturday
temperature: Upper 50s to mid 60s north, 65 to 70 Champlain Valley and south
